excerpt: "In this post, we look at how we can automate the detection of anomalies in a manufactured product using Amazon Lookout for Vision. Using Amazon Lookout for Vision, you can notify operators in real time when defects are detected, provide dashboards for monitoring the workload, and get visual insights"
